News.headline: Daggers Matchday Mascot Opportunities
News.short_description: With only 5 home games left this season give your child a memory they will never forget with our matchday mascot package
News.description:
A day that you and your child will treasure forever can be yours for just £150.

For that your child will receive the following:

·Photo and personal write up in the matchday programme,
·Full Dagenham & Redbridge kit (either home or away),
·Opportunity to join the squad in the pre-match warm-up,
·Lead the team onto the pitch prior to kick-off,
·Photographic memento of the day,
·Three tickets to the Carling Stand.

As the mascot, your child will mix with Dagenham & Redbridge players on the match-day with opportunities for photographs and autographs. He or she will also join the team in front the Daggers home crowd on the Chigwell Construction Stadium turf.

Following the match access to the sponsors lounge is available which is where all the matchday squad wind down after the match.

To book or check availability, please ring 0208 592 1549 ext. 33 or email commercial@daggers.co.uk

Alternatively download here, complete and return the Mascot booking form to the club's Ticket Office.
